data.title: Great food
data.text:
My personal favorite thing about Healthy Junk from my experience is that they have multiple different types of fries. I got the regular skinny fries, chili cheese fries, AND their sweet potato fries. So yes, this is basically a healthy(healthier) fast food restaurant which happens to be vegan. I was surprised that some of their menu items actually seemed pretty healthy; though, after simply reading their menu online beforehand.

They had various types of juice offered, the one of which I had was great.
The sweet potato fries definitely were the healthiest of the few, they seemed like they had little to no oil, and perhaps they were baked. The ranch sauce that came with the fries definitely made them more outstanding in my opinion. 

The one comment I have is that when I ordered I was not given a number to take when I sat down, though to be honest I'm not sure if that was by error of the employee working or that I simply was not fully paying attention when I paid - BUT there weren't that many people there and all I had to do was explain to the girl when she brought my juice that I did not get a number and she just brought everything to me.

Overall, the food was worth what I paid, and the employees were very nice.

data.title: I had such high hopes
data.text:
Average quality, not much of a selection, small portions and not cheap
The BLTA had chewy "Bacn" and wasn't very warm. The staff is nice, but not ready for a lunch time rush. I'll try it again just because I want them to succeed..

data.title: GREAT Vegan restaurant!!!
data.text: One of the BEST vegan restaurants I've been to, REALLY enjoyed the fish tacos!!! Even my VERY picky twelve year old nephew was able to find something to eat!!! LOVE the smoothies & the shakes!!!

data.title: Great Vegan Food!
data.text: I had a mango salad, coconut kale smoothie, bunny love cake. All tasted delicious! Would love to go back again! A lot of variety of healthy food such as smoothies, burgers, snacks, salads and more...

data.title: Many tasty choices
data.text: We drove to Healthy Junk because of the ratings. We were not disappointed. We tried the vegan philly cheez and the vegan chili pepper burger. Both were excellent and would appeal to carnivores as well. We sat outside and enjoyed historic Anaheim.

data.title: Best vegan food I've had
data.text: THANK YOU for having amazing choices for us vegans! People literally still think I only eat salad. Lol. Had the philly cheese steak and it was PHENOMENAL. Will be back anytime I am in this area. Greatly decorated. Fantastic dessert. Friendly, professional service.

data.title: Knocked my socks off!
data.text: The bestie and I ventured out to try this place.  We're always on the hunt for a good vegetarian restaurant.  We chose a tough day due to some festival going on but lucked out and got 2 seats at the bar!  We both ordered the buffalo "chicken" sandwich and shared the sweet potato fries.  The sandwiches were INCREDIBLE!!!  The mix of flavors is spot on - the ranch, buffalo sauce, red onion and crisp lettuce were PERFECT together.  Also, the bread it came on was amazing!  Crisp outside, soft and tender inside.  The fries were good - very healthy......light breading that was like a cornmeal crust and the fries were not greasy at all.  They melted in your mouth.  I really loved the BBQ sauce they gave as a dipping sauce.  The ranch was good, as well.  We can't wait to go back and try some other items from the menu!  We loved it here!

data.title: A pleasant surprise
data.text: I always love trying healthy/organic cafes, so was really eager to see what this one was like after reading the reviews. I had the BBQ slaw roll, delicious! My partner is a real meat lover, so he was a bit apprehensive about this place. He got the special (BBQ burger) and really enjoyed it, he even wanted to come back a second time before we headed back to Australia. I also tried the green coconut juice and was really impressed, so yummy! Friendly staff and didn't have to wait long for our meals either. The only negative I can say is that they use waaaay too much sauce on their burgers/rolls. Kind of takes away from the other ingredients. I definitely recommend giving it ago though!

data.title: Vegan, Tasty Creative
data.text: Healthy Junk is a vegan restaurant with a comfort food spin.  I loved the Kale Salad.  The on tap Kombacha is fantastic.   Good food takes a while so be patient.

data.title: Resisted this place, but ended up being really Good!
data.text: People kept telling me this was a great place, but I just didn't want to have dinner at a place without sit-down dining. But the food was delicious and sitting outside on the patio/corner and watching the clouds roll by and the dogs getting their walks ended up being just delightful. I also really liked the staff.

data.title: Great Vegan Food
data.text: This is is such a cute part of Anaheim. Wish we had more time to explore other restaurants and cafes in this part of town! Healthy Junk is great for the traveling vegan and vegetarian. I went with 3 other people and we all loved our meals. I had the Hawaiian Pizza, and I gotta say this is one of the things I've been missing since going vegetarian. It was such a blessing to eat a veggie version. We shared a bunch of desserts and we all agreed that the Carrot Cake was AMAZING!

data.title: Wow!!
data.text:
I'm not vegan at all neither vegetarian, but this restaurant has all the taste of a good food we all desire!!

The vegan pepperoni pizza wow!! So good!! The vegan nachos loved them, but the vega carrot cake was excellent!! I will definitely come back

Thanks again!!

Joab

data.title: Healthy Junk Yum!
data.text: First time here. All vegan. I got the Anaheim Chili Burger, chili cheese fries, a fudge brownie with a vanilla oreo shake. Oh, and I couldn't resist the cut bunny and carrots crossbones design, so I got a shirt too. Total was $44.66. Yum! I love finding and trying new vegan places to eat. It's been a while since I had chili cheese fries and a shake.

data.title: Vegan wonderful
data.text: Strawberry shake had coconut in it and while a surprise it was excellent!  Got the Anaheim chili burger. Really good. Recommended.  The fries were top notch.

data.title: Wonderful Vegan Food
data.text: We loved the food and the atmosphere. We had fish tacos, a fish burger, and curly yam fries. As vegetarians, my husband and I haven't been to many vegan places with "fish" options, so this was new to us (and really good). We sat outside to eat and the weather was perfect. We'll definitely be back.

data.title: Vegan and Delicious,
data.text: We loved the food here! We ordered a Totally Taco and the BBQ with Slaw sandwich. The two men working at the counter were friendly and helped us decide on trying their fresh beet juice, which was a great choice!

data.title: Vegan, Vegetarian & Gluten free Dreams
data.text: Insanely friendly and informative owners, friendly staff and tasty food.  Need this kind of thing down under!!!  Healthy tasty food AND drinks!!!  Cafe style environment and a definite return on our next visit.

data.title: Great Vegan Lunch!!
data.text: Loved the food and the owner was so nice!  We split a burger, a BBQ pizza, sweet potato fries and chips/salsa.  The food was fresh and delicious.  The portions were perfect size.  What a wonderful place to enjoy an outdoor lunch.

data.title: Excellent vegan food!
data.text: The owner, Lynda, is just delightful.  If you have never tried vegan food before, she will ease you into the menu.  I love the kale salads.  Everything I've tried has been delicious.  The staff members are all friendly and eager to answer questions.

data.title: Vegan, good and tasty.
data.text: Vegan, good but a little expensive. I want to like it all, and while I loved the fish n chips and kale salad, the Philly was too heavy. I do want to explore more of their menu though.
